addmoney.label: Amount to Add

addnew.title: Add New Pot
addnew.text: Create a pot to set savings targets. These can help keep you on track as you save for special purchases.
addnew.name: Pot Name
addnew.notification: Pot '{{ title }}' has been added to the database

delete.title: Delete '{{ title }}'?
delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete this pot? This action cannot be reversed, and all the data inside it will be removed forever.
